sentences: Mietin, miltä tuo bändi kuulostaa live-esiintymisessä.
context: The Finnish word 'bändi' is a loanword from English 'band', commonly used to refer to music groups or bands. It's used in the same way as in English, to describe organized groups of musicians who play together and create music. The word can be used for any type of musical group - rock bands, pop groups, jazz ensembles, etc.
